dict.acceptation: 激进主义分子；积极分子；积极行动者；
激进主义的；激进主义分子的；

sent.orig: Al Sharpton, a civil-rights activist and former candidate, described him as Ross Perot with a resumé.
sent.trans: 民权运动活动家及前总统候选人阿尔。沙普敦把布伦伯格描述成有实践背景的罗斯。珀汝特（前总统候选人）。

sent.orig: I want to be a vet when i grow up, I am an animal rights activist.
sent.trans: 我想成为一名兽医当我长大了，我是一个动物权利活动家。

sent.orig: ARussian human-rights activist, Lev Ponomaryov, was beaten up in Moscow.
sent.trans: 俄罗斯人权活动家波诺玛里约(LevPonomaryov)在莫斯科被遇袭。

sent.orig: Cindy Sheehan, an antiwar activist, has even compared her to talk-radio' s Rush Limbaugh.
sent.trans: 辛迪·恩，一位反战活动家，甚至把她比作广播电台主持人拉什？林堡。

sent.orig: Yahoo helped Beijing find and arrest a Chinese journalist and prominent rights activist.
sent.trans: 雅虎帮助北京当局找到并逮捕了一名中国记者和一名知名人权活动家。
